name: Frog Night
description:
Frog Night is a romance game where a princess must find the perfect frog to live with her happy prince or princess until the end of time!

But romance is not as easy as it used to be, between the subway, work and sleep, you don't have time to find love. What a hard life to be a modern princess!

To realize your destiny THE SOLUTION is speed dating only 10 seconds per frog, but how to know which one is the right one? They should fit your criteria, if they have more than two flaws in your eyes then they're out!

Analyze the tastes of your princess and try to find the love of her life, investigate the charismatic frogs' dialogue and find the clues to eliminate them until there is only one left!

The game is in french !


Game Programmer

- Ema Ouardi

- Yanis Rojano

Game Art

- Carla Magnani

- Aida Menheim

- Marc Amaury Fauris

Tech Art

- Hector Brun

Game Design

- Eliass Godson

- Simon Dialinas

- Arthur Parmentier

Rules : 

Take a look at your princess' tastes in the tab at the right of the screen. When you're sure about wanting to kick out a suitor, click on the broken heart icone. Otherwise, they'll come back for you to ask them more questions.
